alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Camden, southwestern Mercer, north central Gloucester, northern Burlington, southeastern Montgomery, southeastern Bucks, Philadelphia and northeastern Delaware Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Philadelphia, or near Camden, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Trenton, Camden, Gloucester City, Cherry Hill, Bensalem, Evesham, Mount Laurel, Ewing, Willingboro, Deptford, Voorhees, Medford, West Deptford, Lindenwold, Lumberton, Florence, Bellmawr, Yeadon and Woodbury. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 3 and 7A. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 348 and 359. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 10 and 40. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 336 and 351. Interstate 76 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 19 and 64, and between mile markers 70 and 72. Interstate 676 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 676 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 8 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia
